entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
